com.plugins.pluginloader

Class JarPluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plugins.pluginloader.JarPluginLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginLoaderIFace

    public class JarPluginLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluginLoaderIFace

    Used to load Plugins from jar files

    it uses a class loader and read class From jar files specified in a property called className and found in JarPluginLoader.PLUGIN_METADATA_FILE clients of this loader should implements the JarPluginBase if you want to use PluginIFace interface you reimpelement the loadPlugin member
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Khaled(icraus)

      static java.lang.String PLUGIN_METADATA_FILE
